div.h1: Building A Solid Foundation for Every Child
div.p: Heritage Elementary School is a tuition-FREE, not-for-profit K-8 charter school providing an exceptional educational environment that focuses on superior academics and family values with a character-based curriculum. Heritage Elementary strives to develop a lifelong love of learning, community service, and integrity in all students.
